passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Deals 6 − 23 (based on level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (325 range).Hitting an enemy with an immobilizing ability deals 6 − 23 (based on level) (+ 1% bonus health) bonus magic damage and releases a fire nova that also deals that bonus damage to nearby enemies (12 second cooldown).Immolate's damage is increased by 100% against minions and monsters.
